selfIntro: My name is Elliott Fiedler and I'm a software engineer.
cofounded: In 2016, I co-founded a startup in Japan that provides 1-to-1 online English lessons for children. As CTO, I architected, built and deployed the service platform, internal tooling and client-facing web and mobile apps.
available: I'm available to help out on a variety of projects.
twitter: You can follow me on Twitter
github: and check out my other projects on GitHub.
